name: Rat Game (Gaming Squid)
description:
****************(PLAYING MUTED IS RECOMMENDED)****************

This game was part of a quick group Game Jam project as part of my game development course at university.

The Game Engine used is Bitsy which is free and you can use it in browser. The Engine is very limiting in what you are able to do in it.

Your goal is to navigate through the maze of the sewer trying to find out a way that you are able to escape it.

CONTROLS:

PC - Use the arrow keys or WASD to move the character.

Mobile - Swipe in the direction you want the character to move.
